simple.reject_desc: This instance will not accept messages from the following instances:

simple.media_removal_desc: This instance removes media from posts on the following instances:
simple.media_nsfw_desc: This instance forces media to be set sensitive in posts on the following instances:

polls.not_enough_options: Too few unique options in poll

emoji.load_all_hint: Loaded first {saneAmount} emoji, loading all emoji may cause performance issues.

errors.storage_unavailable: Pleroma could not access browser storage. Your login or your local settings won't be saved and you might encounter unexpected issues. Try enabling cookies.

post_status.account_not_locked_warning: Your account is not {0}. Anyone can follow you to view your follower-only posts.
post_status.default: Learn to swim, see you down in Arizona Bay.
post_status.direct_warning_to_all: This post will be visible to all the mentioned users.
post_status.direct_warning_to_first_only: This post will only be visible to the mentioned users at the beginning of the message.
post_status.edit_remote_warning: Other remote instances may not support editing and unable to receive the latest version of your post.
post_status.edit_unsupported_warning: Pleroma does not support editing mentions or polls.
post_status.empty_status_error: Can't post an empty status with no files
post_status.media_description_error: Failed to update media, try again

scope_notice.public: This post will be visible to everyone
scope_notice.private: This post will be visible to your followers only
scope_notice.unlisted: This post will not be visible in Public Timeline and The Whole Known Network

scope.direct: Direct - post to mentioned users only
scope.unlisted: Unlisted - do not post to public timelines

registration.new_captcha: Click the image to get a new captcha

Hi, I'm Lain.

validations.password_confirmation_match: should be the same as password

registration.email_language: In which language do you want to receive emails from the server?

settings.setting_server_side: This setting is tied to your profile and affects all sessions and clients
settings.enter_current_password_to_confirm: Enter your current password to confirm your identity

mfa.title: Two-factor Authentication
mfa.warning_of_generate_new_codes: When you generate new recovery codes, your old codes won’t work anymore.
mfa.recovery_codes_warning: Write the codes down or save them somewhere secure - otherwise you won't see them again. If you lose access to your 2FA app and recovery codes you'll be locked out of your account.

scan.title: Scan
scan.desc: Using your two-factor app, scan this QR code or enter text key:

verify.desc: To enable two-factor authentication, enter the code from your two-factor app:

settings.allow_following_move: Allow auto-follow when following account moves
settings.email_language: Language for receiving emails from the server
settings.block_export_button: Export your blocks to a csv file
settings.blocks_imported: Blocks imported! Processing them will take a while.
settings.mute_export_button: Export your mutes to a csv file
settings.mutes_imported: Mutes imported! Processing them will take a while.
settings.import_mutes_from_a_csv_file: Import mutes from a csv file
settings.account_backup_description: This allows you to download an archive of your account information and your posts, but they cannot yet be imported into a Pleroma account.
settings.backup_not_ready: This backup is not ready yet.
settings.backup_running: This backup is in progress, processed {number} record. | This backup is in progress, processed {number} records.
settings.change_email_error: There was an issue changing your email.
settings.change_password_error: There was an issue changing your password.
settings.delete_account_description: Permanently delete your data and deactivate your account.
settings.delete_account_error: There was an issue deleting your account. If this persists please contact your instance administrator.
settings.delete_account_instructions: Type your password in the input below to confirm account deletion.
settings.move_account_notes: If you want to move the account somewhere else, you must go to your target account and add an alias pointing here.
settings.discoverable: Allow discovery of this account in search results and other services
settings.avatar_size_instruction: The recommended minimum size for avatar images is 150x150 pixels.
settings.pad_emoji: Pad emoji with spaces when adding from picker
settings.autocomplete_select_first: Automatically select the first candidate when autocomplete results are available
settings.filtering_explanation: All statuses containing these words will be muted, one per line
settings.follow_export_button: Export your follows to a csv file
settings.follows_imported: Follows imported! Processing them will take a while.
settings.max_thumbnails: Maximum amount of thumbnails per post (empty = no limit)
settings.always_show_post_button: Always show floating New Post button
settings.use_one_click_nsfw: Open NSFW attachments with just one click
settings.hide_post_stats: Hide post statistics (e.g. the number of favorites)
settings.hide_user_stats: Hide user statistics (e.g. the number of followers)
settings.import_blocks_from_a_csv_file: Import blocks from a csv file
settings.import_followers_from_a_csv_file: Import follows from a csv file
settings.invalid_theme_imported: The selected file is not a supported Pleroma theme. No changes to your theme were made.
settings.lock_account_description: Restrict your account to approved followers only
settings.loop_video_silent_only: Loop only videos without sound (i.e. Mastodon's "gifs")
settings.play_videos_in_modal: Play videos in a popup frame

file_export_import.backup_settings_theme: Backup settings and theme to file

errors.invalid_file: The selected file is not a supported Pleroma settings backup. No changes were made.
errors.file_too_new: Incompatile major version: {fileMajor}, this PleromaFE (settings ver {feMajor}) is too old to handle it
errors.file_too_old: Incompatile major version: {fileMajor}, file version is too old and not supported (min. set. ver. {feMajor})
errors.file_slightly_new: File minor version is different, some settings might not load

settings.use_contain_fit: Don't crop the attachment in thumbnails
settings.name: Name
settings.notification_visibility_polls: Ends of polls you voted in
settings.no_rich_text_description: Strip rich text formatting from all posts
settings.hide_favorites_description: Don't show list of my favorites (people still get notified)
settings.pause_on_unfocused: Pause when tab is not focused
settings.radii_help: Set up interface edge rounding (in pixels)
settings.reply_visibility_following: Only show replies directed at me or users I'm following
settings.reply_visibility_self: Only show replies directed at me
settings.search_user_to_block: Search whom you want to block
settings.search_user_to_mute: Search whom you want to mute
settings.scope_copy: Copy scope when replying (DMs are always copied)
settings.reset_avatar_confirm: Do you really want to reset the avatar?
settings.reset_banner_confirm: Do you really want to reset the banner?
settings.reset_background_confirm: Do you really want to reset the background?
settings.disable_sticky_headers: Don't stick column headers to top of the screen
settings.third_column_mode: When there's enough space, show third column containing
settings.third_column_mode_none: Don't show third column at all
settings.tree_advanced: Allow more flexible navigation in tree view
settings.tree_fade_ancestors: Display ancestors of the current status in faint text
settings.max_depth_in_thread: Maximum number of levels in thread to display by default
settings.sensitive_by_default: Mark posts as sensitive by default
settings.stop_gifs: Pause animated images until you hover on them
settings.streaming: Automatically show new posts when scrolled to the top
settings.theme_help: Use hex color codes (#rrggbb) to customize your color theme.
settings.theme_help_v2_1: You can also override certain component's colors and opacity by toggling the checkbox, use "Clear all" button to clear all overrides.
settings.theme_help_v2_2: Icons underneath some entries are background/text contrast indicators, hover over for detailed info. Please keep in mind that when using transparency contrast indicators show the worst possible case.
settings.use_at_icon: Display {'@'} symbol as an icon instead of text
settings.mention_link_display_full_for_remote: as full names only for remote users (e.g. {'@'}foo{'@'}example.org)
settings.mention_link_use_tooltip: Show user card when clicking mention links
settings.mention_link_show_avatar: Show user avatar beside the link
settings.mention_link_show_avatar_quick: Show user avatar next to mentions
settings.mention_link_bolden_you: Highlight mention of you when you are mentioned
settings.user_popover_avatar_overlay: Show user popover over user avatar
settings.notification_setting_block_from_stranger: Block notifications from users who you do not follow
settings.notification_setting_hide_notification_c: Hide the sender and contents of push notifications
settings.notification_mutes: To stop receiving notifications from a specific user, use a mute.
settings.notification_blocks: Blocking a user stops all notifications as well as unsubscribes them.

switcher.save_load_hint: "Keep" options preserve currently set options when selecting or loading themes, it also stores said options when exporting a theme. When all checkboxes unset, exporting theme will save everything.

help.upgraded_from_v2: PleromaFE has been upgraded, theme could look a little bit different than you remember.
help.v2_imported: File you imported was made for older FE. We try to maximize compatibility but there still could be inconsistencies.
help.future_version_imported: File you imported was made in newer version of FE.
help.older_version_imported: File you imported was made in older version of FE.
help.snapshot_present: Theme snapshot is loaded, so all values are overriden. You can load theme's actual data instead.
help.snapshot_missing: No theme snapshot was in the file so it could look different than originally envisioned.
help.fe_upgraded: PleromaFE's theme engine upgraded after version update.
help.migration_snapshot_ok: Just to be safe, theme snapshot loaded. You can try loading theme data.
help.migration_napshot_gone: For whatever reason snapshot was missing, some stuff could look different than you remember.
help.snapshot_source_mismatch: Versions conflict: most likely FE was rolled back and updated again, if you changed theme using older version of FE you most likely want to use old version, otherwise use new version.

common_colors.foreground_hint: See "Advanced" tab for more detailed control

shadows.hintV3: For shadows you can also use the {0} notation to use other color slot.

filter_hint.always_drop_shadow: Warning, this shadow always uses {0} when browser supports it.
filter_hint.drop_shadow_syntax: {0} does not support {1} parameter and {2} keyword.
filter_hint.avatar_inset: Please note that combining both inset and non-inset shadows on avatars might give unexpected results with transparent avatars.
filter_hint.spread_zero: Shadows with spread > 0 will appear as if it was set to zero

fonts.help: Select font to use for elements of UI. For "custom" you have to enter exact font name as it appears in system.

components.postCode: Monospaced text in a post (rich text)

preview.input: Learn to swim, see you down in Arizona Bay.
preview.fine_print: Read our {0} to learn nothing useful!
preview.checkbox: I have skimmed over terms and conditions

settings.commit_value_tooltip: Value is not saved, press this button to commit your changes
settings.hard_reset_value_tooltip: Remove setting from storage, forcing use of default value

admin_dash.wip_notice: This admin dashboard is experimental and WIP, {adminFeLink}.

nodb.heading: Database config is disabled
nodb.text: You need to change backend config files so that {property} is set to {value}, see more in {documentation}.
nodb.text2: Most configuration options will be unavailable.

restrict.description: Detailed setting for allowing/disallowing access to certain aspects of API. By default (indeterminate state) it will disallow if instance is not public, ticked checkbox means disallow access even if instance is public, unticked means allow access even if instance is private. Please note that unexpected behavior might happen if some settings are set, i.e. if profile access is disabled posts will show without profile information.

frontend.wip_notice: Please note that this section is a WIP and lacks certain features as backend implementation of front-end management is incomplete.
frontend.default_frontend_tip: Default front-end will be shown to all users. Currently there's no way to for a user to select personal front-end. If you switch away from PleromaFE you'll most likely have to use old and buggy AdminFE to do instance configuration until we replace it.
frontend.default_frontend_tip2: WIP: Since Pleroma backend doesn't properly list all installed frontends you'll have to enter name and reference manually. List below provides shortcuts to fill the values.

:public.label: Instance is public
:public.description: Disabling this will make all API accessible only for logged-in users, this will make Public and Federated timelines inaccessible to anonymous visitors.

:limit_to_local_content.label: Limit search to local content
:limit_to_local_content.description: Disables global network search for unauthenticated (default), all users or none

timeline.no_retweet_hint: Post is marked as followers-only or direct and cannot be repeated

status.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this status?
status.show_attachment_description: Preview description (open attachment for full description)
status.thread_show_full: Show everything under this thread ({numStatus} status in total, max depth {depth}) | Show everything under this thread ({numStatus} statuses in total, max depth {depth})
status.thread_follow: See the remaining part of this thread ({numStatus} status in total) | See the remaining part of this thread ({numStatus} statuses in total)
status.ancestor_follow: See {numReplies} other reply under this status | See {numReplies} other replies under this status
status.show_all_conversation: Show full conversation ({numStatus} other status) | Show full conversation ({numStatus} other statuses)
status.show_only_conversation_under_this: Only show replies to this status

admin_menu.delete_user_data_and_deactivate_confirma: This will permanently delete the data from this account and deactivate it. Are you absolutely sure?

user_reporting.title: Reporting {0}

user_reporting.forward_description: The account is from another server. Send a copy of the report there as well?
user_reporting.generic_error: An error occurred while processing your request.

tool_tip.toggle_expand: Expand or collapse notification to show post in full
tool_tip.toggle_mute: Expand or collapse notification to reveal muted content
tool_tip.autocomplete_available: {number} result is available. Use up and down keys to navigate through them. | {number} results are available. Use up and down keys to navigate through them.

password_reset.instruction: Enter your email address or username. We will send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset.check_email: Check your email for a link to reset your password.
password_reset.too_many_requests: You have reached the limit of attempts, try again later.
password_reset.password_reset_disabled: Password reset is disabled. Please contact your instance administrator.
password_reset.password_reset_required: You must reset your password to log in.
password_reset.password_reset_required_but_mailer_is_di: You must reset your password, but password reset is disabled. Please contact your instance administrator.

chats.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this message?
chats.error_loading_chat: Something went wrong when loading the chat.
chats.error_sending_message: Something went wrong when sending the message.
chats.empty_chat_list_placeholder: You don't have any chats yet. Start a new chat!

update.big_update_content: We haven't had a release in a while, so things might look and feel different than what you're used to.
update.update_bugs: Please report any issues and bugs on {pleromaGitlab}, as we have changed a lot, and although we test thoroughly and use development versions ourselves, we may have missed some things. We welcome your feedback and suggestions on issues you might encounter, or how to improve Pleroma and Pleroma-FE.
update.update_changelog: For more details on what's changed, see {theFullChangelog}.
